column4: How do I create a ramdisk as a partition, without mounting it? `mount -t tmpfs` doesn't work, because I don't want it mounted, I want it as a raw partition to extend an lvm onto.
probably  zram module will help you. This is not tmpfs  but   it will create block device in ram
Ok, sweet, compression probably isn't necessary in this case. I'm looking into zram now, thanks.
